article_title: New Poll Shows That Medicare Part D Is Getting The Job Done For Seniors

article_metadata.description: It has been a long, troubled road for Obamacare. As has been the case since the President rolled out the Affordable Care Act at the end of last year, there are conflicting reports as to whether it’s working or not. A new Rasmussen Reports poll finds that only 39 percent of Americans [...]
article_metadata.author: Doug Schoen
